beasts.name: Elden Wolf
beasts.description: A gaunt wolf wreathed in ember-mist; its ribs glow like banked coals when it inhales. It stalks burned paths and battlefield pyres, and its howl wakes the heat sleeping in ash and blood.
beasts.alt: A gaunt wolf with ember-lit eyes

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if an ally is within 5 ft. and not incapacitated.

traits.name: Kindled Bite
traits.desc: Bite deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to creatures carrying a flame or that took fire damage since the wolf’s last turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6+3) piercing plus 7 (2d6) fire damage. DC 12 STR save or knocked prone.

actions.name: Cinder Howl (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Creatures of the wolf’s choice within 20 ft. that can hear it must make a DC 12 WIS save or be frightened until the end of the wolf’s next turn; on a failure by 5+, also take 7 (2d6) fire damage.

beasts.lore: Wolves kindled by the ash-winds of Skazka’s burned woods. Their howls stir sleeping embers into hungry sparks.

beasts.name: Memory Wraith
beasts.description: A hollow silhouette stitched from whispered names; it drinks recollection through touch, leaving faces familiar but unlabeled. In moonlight it trails ribbons of borrowed thoughts that flutter like torn parchment.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: Can move through other creatures and objects as if difficult terrain, taking 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Drinking the Thread
traits.desc: When the wraith deals psychic damage to a creature, that creature subtracts 1d4 from the next Intelligence or Wisdom check before the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Memory Lash
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6+3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Unspool (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: One creature the wraith can see within 30 ft. makes a DC 14 WIS save or loses a random proficiency until the end of its next short rest.

beasts.lore: Born of the Hollow Depths; they drink what you are by unspooling what you were.

beasts.name: Thorn-Crowned Stag
beasts.description: A regal stag burdened with a living briar-crown that weeps sap like blood. Where it passes, hedges wake and close; trespassers pay a toll of thorns, or are woven into the hedge itself.
beasts.alt: A vast stag crowned in living thorns

traits.name: Harbinger of Than
traits.desc: While the stag can see the sky, allies of its choice within 30 ft. have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Bleeding Crown
traits.desc: The stag’s antlers deal an extra 1d6 piercing damage to creatures that have damaged plants in the last 24 hours.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Trample
actions.desc: If the stag moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the stag can make one Stomp attack against it as a bonus action (Stomp: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., Hit 13 (2d6+6) bludgeoning).

beasts.lore: A harbinger of Than’s displeasure; its crown bleeds where axes have bitten bark.

beasts.name: Desert Glass Serpent
beasts.description: A dune-burrower of fused glass and sunfire; its mirrored scales refract daylight into knives. When threatened it shatters into skittering shards, only to reknit around the nearest heat like molten sand.
beasts.alt: A crystalline serpent glinting like broken glass

traits.name: Glass Body
traits.desc: Critical hits against the serpent deal normal damage (not critical).

traits.name: Mirage Sheen
traits.desc: Creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to see the serpent in bright light.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The serpent makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8+6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) slashing from shards.

actions.name: Shatter Coil (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Creatures in a 15-ft. radius must make a DC 15 DEX save or take 18 (4d8) slashing damage and 18 (4d8) thunder damage, or half as much on a success.

beasts.lore: Said to coil in the cursed belts near lost Velkaria, where the sand sings like broken crystal.

beasts.name: Cathedral Moth
beasts.description: A solemn night-moth with stained-glass wings that cast holy-hued shadows; its dust hushes voices to a reverent whisper. Drawn to bells and ruined chancels, it nests in vellum and candle smoke.
beasts.alt: A pale moth with windowed wings like stained glass

traits.name: Dust of Candleflame
traits.desc: Creatures that start their turn within 5 ft. of the moth while it is flying must succeed on a DC 12 CON save or have their speed reduced by 10 ft. until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dream-Siphon (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: One creature within 5 ft. makes a DC 12 WIS save or gains one level of exhaustion as the moth sips at sleeping thoughts.

beasts.lore: Drawn to inverted cathedrals and dream-ruins; their dust eats at candleflame and memory.
